mud_networking
Class MUDPlayer

java.lang.Object
  mud_networking.MUDPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientNotifier, java.rmi.Remote
public class MUDPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientNotifier

This is the main communication class of the client application. It represents the player and is used to interact with the game server (by performing all player actions, like world interaction, logging into the game, disconnecting etc.).

Version:
1.0
Author:
Krzysztof Kondrak
